summary: The Constitutional Emoluments Protection of American Interests Act of 2025 prohibits the use of any federal funds at properties or entities owned, managed, or controlled by Donald J. Trump. This includes a ban on using federal money for any new contracts, grants, or cooperative agreements with these specified entities. The bill provides a non-exhaustive list of dozens of domestic and international hotels, golf clubs, LLCs, and trusts associated with Donald J. Trump to which this prohibition would apply, aiming to prevent conflicts of interest and address constitutional emoluments concerns.
